h2.strong:
Due to the closure of our campus, instruction for students of Dora Consolidated Schools will be transitioning to a learn-from-home model.
This page is dedicated to providing our families with information about our plan to provide "Continuous Learning Opportunities" throughout the remainder of this school year.

p.span: A Message from the Superintendent, Brandon Hays.
A Message from the Principal, Mr. Myatt.
